headline: Franklin Templeton Hires Rich Nuzum as Head of OCIO
summary: SAN MATEO, Calif., July 17, 2025--Franklin Templeton today announced that Rich Nuzum, former Executive Director, Investments for Mercer, has joined Franklin Templeton Investment Solutions (FTIS) as Head of OCIO. Nuzum will be based in New York and report directly to Adam Petryk, Head of Franklin Templeton Investment Solutions.
